content: loop only invisible join 1 cut the yarn and pull the loop to make one string pull the cut yarn through the loop and insert the hook in the first loop of this round 2 pull the yarn to the other side 3 insert the hook into the last chain back loop only and pull the yarn to the other side weave in the rest of the yarn 4 overview from the top congratulations and thank you thank you for trying out this pattern if you have any troubles or suggestions of how i can improve it don t hesitate to dm me be sure to check out the other granny squares in this series too 4
